website_summaries.verdict: A great first set of clubs for new golfers at a sweet-spot price point.
pros: A stylish, attractive golf bag that is lightweight and easy to carry around the course
Contains the basic drivers, irons, wedge, and putter needed for right-handed play
cons: Clubs are sized for taller women
Bag isn’t as durable as heavier-weight cart bags and could use more storage pockets

website_summaries.verdict: Uniquely designed for distance and beginner golfers.
pros: Durable golf clubs that are uncomplicated in a good way and ideal for those new to the sport
Less intimidating to use than other brands yet at the same time, respected and well-received on the course
We love the details including the multiple pockets in the bag

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs for the price however be aware these are ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice clubs for the price however be aware these are a "tall" club not standard length. It did not state this when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Lerin M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clubs! I am not a beginner, I have been golfing most of my life and these are great clubs. I used to struggle with my drive, not from the ladies tees, I can out drive or at least keep up with most men! You don't even have to swing that hard. The set is perfect, love all the clubs. The bag is beautiful! What an awesome value and purchase. My husband uses some of the clubs in my bag as well. I am 5'7" and the length is perfect. I recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the occasional golfer!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new clubs! I’m a fairly new golfer and got this as my first official set of my own. I needed a set of my own but can’t get out as much as I’d like and didn’t want to spend a fortune. This set was the perfect match. It’s classy and pretty. I love the feel and weight of each club. The quality is really nice too. Great price for the set.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clubs for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely excited about my new clubs! The bag is lightweight, colorful with no complaints so far. I've practiced down by the range, the clubs swing effortlessly and fit great in my hands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Daughters xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful, Daughter drove the ball at least another 30 yards further than her old clubs. Excellent investment for a future college scholarship ( just kidding chill liberals)
customer_reviews.author: michael nudelman

customer_reviews.title: Found my fairway companion!
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting off investing in my own clubs for the longest time, but this is my year and I know I made the right decision with this set to start off with. Great quality, cute and light enough. I was worried they would be too long as I am just barely 5 feet tall, but they are comfortable and can’t tell you how that goes a long way (literally!). It doesn’t have a sand wedge but I have everything I need as a novice. Good set to build off of.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Versoza

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with my new clubs! Easy to swing, comfortable and my score has improved! However, I purchased petite length which is to be 1” shorter than standard and they are not. I had kept the box to return them but my game improved so much, I’m keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Not What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner to golf and did a lot of research on the internet to find a set of clubs suitable for a senior, petite, woman golfer. I find these clubs to be way to heavy and virtually no flex in the shaft. A friend has a set in another brand that was cheaper and is lightweight and flexible. It is probably too late to return as I have used them and it looks like they are used. I will try to sell them and get clubs more suitable for a senior lady. They are probably fine for a younger person.
customer_reviews.author: Donna  S

customer_reviews.title: Another Recipient of Super Long Clubs
customer_reviews.text: According to the product description, the base model only comes in Standard women's sizing. However, like another reviewer said, what I received were "Super Long" clubs. I'm 5'3". Not going to work. The clubs might have been awesome if I'd gotten what the product was supposed to be. We'll never know.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not for Tall Women - Pink Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 10" tall. After reading many of the other reviews, I thought I might be able to get away with this women's set of clubs, but they are not designing for someone of my height. The clubs look great and the set was very lightweight in the bag. However, the bag is also more pink than purple/mauve as displayed in the picture. Not quite was I was looking for, but great value for the price. I would've kept them if the clubs were a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: ndb001

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set for beginners, like myself, to train and have fun for a good while. I don't know how long it'll last without the heads popping off but as far as I can tell - works just fine and seems pretty sturdy with good quality material. Got this for my wife and she's loving it. Highly recommended golf set!
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for: Tall womens beginner clubs
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Tall set, so it does not come with a stand. You'll need to buy a cart. Great clubs, basic starter pack, stylish and I love them. High recommend. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for petite woman
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for beginners. My husband has played for years and he thought these would be good for me. I’m 5’ nothing and the PEs are great! Did some practicing today on the driving range and really enjoyed using several of the clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Karenshair

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs for the price but definitely not Wilson brand.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Bonick

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought both the mens and women's set. They are both very nice and we are happy with the clubs. My only complaint is that the mens version comes with a built in bag stand and much nicer carrying strap. For the life of me I cant understand why the womens version doesnt have the built in stand feature.
customer_reviews.author: robert cisco

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner golfer and this set was perfect. I had been golfing with men’s clubs (borrowed from dad and brother) and these are much more comfortable and lightweight. Easy to adjust to and quality seems good so far. Plus I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful clubs for this lefty 💛
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs !!!! So perfect for me and bonus they actually sent me a left handed set lol you never know online and it's kinda important. Very very happy I finally bought myself an early Bday gift.
customer_reviews.author: ursula h

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I really like my golf clubs. They come in a petite size in addition to the normal women's size. However, if you order the petite size, be aware that the golf bag does not have the built in stand that it has if you order the regular size. Also, the Wilson box the clubs come in says you can get five golf lessons from a golf pro for $99. That program no longer exists so you're out of luck on that.
customer_reviews.author: T. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these during the Prime Day sale, and I have to say, it was one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. For a starter set of clubs, these work perfectly. I am especially highly impressed with the driver. All the clubs feel great. The bag has the perfect amount of storage. the only downfall is it does not include a kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Monson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for a beginner set! My friend bought them last year and loves them! Great as a total newbie to the game and amazing value for the $$
customer_reviews.author: Komilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs/ Not Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a 1st time golfer - The clubs themselves are nice, I am 5’1 so the height is perfect. The bag is where the quality really goes down. New bag but 2/3 times that I have used the bag the zippers get stuck and peel apart, I have to constantly realign them. Not what I would expect for a $400+ product. Very disappointed in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: GINA

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: From a beginner standpoint these are good, clubs swing nicely and carrying is less cumbersome than thought. I will be looking for a different bag as this one will look dirty quick!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Wife didn't know if she wanted to try golfing or not. Got her this set, and went to the range. She wants to go hit balls all the time now. Clubs are great. They look good and they are only 1/2 inch shorter than mine, so I can use hers at the range instead of bringing 2 bags.
customer_reviews.author: User15

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with kick stands.
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs but there was no stand on my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs as a beginner! Super light weight and was able to get away with using the standard clubs at 5 foot
customer_reviews.author: callan

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction top priority!
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived within a week! (Despite over the border Covid delays!). Beautiful clubs that look and feel great! I am eager to get out and try! Little disappointed that clubs weren’t ‘tall’ as labelled when I ordered! I wrote the company and their quick response was eager to make it right! Customer satisfaction is priority - a rarity today!! Thank you Red Tag Outlet of Florida! I will be shopping here again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: men's not women's clubs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a women's petite and got a MEN'S TALL. I'm not sure if whoever shipped it cannot read or differentiate color and size but what a wash! Ordered so I would have them for a certain date. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah cain

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, waiting for Governor to lift stay at home orders or at least open golf courses! Please some common sense!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great but not as pictured. Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Just received my clubs they look great and the bag is light however it is not what is pictured above or on the box. I thought it would come with the legs and different straps so the picture is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Irons Too Heavy For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are way too heavy for beginners. Too heavy for my 14 year old. Ended up buying another set, Strata, for my daughter. With graphite shafts.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pei-Tse Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I just play bc of my husband. I didnt like the potter but everything else works well.
customer_reviews.author: nikkole qualls

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal for entire set!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to golfing and these clubs are perfect. I’m 5’4” and the size is just right. The bag is a little flimsy but for the price I’m not complaining at all. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginners pick. ⛳️
customer_reviews.text: Im a beginner when it come to golf.. took this little gem to the driving rang and loved it. The quality is great, light weight and a great variety of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: NancyGomez

customer_reviews.title: Solid set up clubs for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these clubs for my girlfriend and she loves them (and does well with them)! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great starter clubs
customer_reviews.text: Wife just got back into the game and these are perfect light weight and great price point to get better.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Great quality clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new clubs! I’m a beginner, but even my experienced golfer husband was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Candice L

customer_reviews.title: Amazon needs to list/send the correct product!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs look great! Excited to use them! Amazon needs to make sure they are listing/sending the correct product though because I was sent a CART bag when the option I selected clearly said CARRY. Disappointed because the carry bag was what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: great beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: these were a perfect 1st set, i don’t golf everyday a few times a month during season, so there are obviously better quality out there but for my first set and not having to borrow all the time i highly recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as my first set of clubs and they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Darcel Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set for the price. Extra length was a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A COMPLETE SET
customer_reviews.text: The title and the product description are wrong. This is not a complete set of clubs. Mine came with a driver and a putter, noting else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality set perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up golf recently and I am beyond thrilled with my new clubs! It's a great value and the quality of the clubs are excellent. As a bonus the mint color of the bags and covers are so pretty! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid clubs for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs! They’ve been good for me so far. I’m athletic but definitely a beginner golfer. Super lightweight, love the colors and they look like higher end clubs without the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Huynh

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was great for me as a beginner, easy to hold despite my short height, lots of pockets, and lightweight/manageable. My only complaint is that it’s not easy to carry it like a backpack (I wish it had wheels but it’s not the bags fault)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner clubs
customer_reviews.text: I love my clubs! I’ve used them now 10-12 times over the last few months and they have been spectacular! I’ve gotten tons of compliments and they play really well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Llbloomfield06

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners set!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners!! I’d recommend this set to any ladies starting out!
customer_reviews.author: Mk279

customer_reviews.title: For the sale price it was worth it
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are nice. But I think the bag is cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are extra long. The driver was the length of my Calloway driver. Other sites say it's for women over 5' 10". Nice set otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. She’s 5’8” and they might be a little bit to short for her, but she’s a beginner so it’s all good. She loves the look of them and it gives her the confidence to keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: love these clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, and a good set of clubs. The bag has two big pockets for plenty of golf stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Clan

customer_reviews.title: Shipped & Delivered on time or early
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for someone else - so no comment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have been out once and my wife likes the clubs. They are light weight and we opted for the longer clubs as she is 5'9". We are pleased after one outing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Welker

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for the value!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and such an amazing value. They are perfect for a beginner like me!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndrody

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the golf clubs, more than I expected. They are the perfect size as well, I am 1.6m and was a bit sceptical but perfect fit. Only minor down fall is the bag it self doesn't have clips to clip a cover over the golf clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Ingham

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Just started golfing and these clubs are great and the price is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: patricia ciaramella

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a little beat up when it arrived but love these clubs!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is very preferential, the service is also very good, give a good comment!
customer_reviews.text: The price is very preferential, the service is also very good, give a good comment!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reiser

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves em.... she's brand new to golf and was using a old set her dad gave her and getting this new set improved her drastically....I think they are a fine beginner set
customer_reviews.author: Chris Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Wife is happy and she is driving well off the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Lehto

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set for the price! I only wish the stand bag was available in petite.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Descent set of clubs for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to replace a set of over 20yr old clubs. They work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Philip VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: Goof,but limited
customer_reviews.text: For me,These clubs are kind of heavy due to the metal shaft. I think it can be challenging for beginners to use if your skills are not high
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need more woods, but I am really enjoying hitting with these clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these clubs, hubby keeps trying to steal them
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for beginers, for the value, they realy helped my game!!
customer_reviews.text: perfect set for a beginner like me or someone who doesn't find the time to play much also like me .
customer_reviews.author: Karen Decker

customer_reviews.title: Petit size is good for women 5 foot tall
customer_reviews.text: Was getting back into golf, got this set at end of season but did better because their size, petit, was a better fit for me
customer_reviews.author: Carla Kuzdzal

customer_reviews.title: Got used one
customer_reviews.text: Good products but iron 7 had scratches when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: jxlee171

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I seldom golf but really wanted new, decent clubs. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A good price for a good product
customer_reviews.text: It is the right weight and the right clubs....I am very pleased! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner golfer and it’s a great set. Love all the pockets for my gadgets
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Canu

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Ordered petite woman clubs. Drive and # 3 too long. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: First set, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first complete set and I am very pleased with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Bowe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality of this set. The rubber brand name decal on the handle was delivered paticially off and by hole 6 was completely off. My 1 Wood as well as my putter came with a dent and scratch. I was also put off by the fact that the box says "complete set" but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize it didn’t come with a three and four iron.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set! Wife is 5'10 and they fit her perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: As a fairly new golfer it was a good buy. I'm 5'2 and it said for 5'3 and under. I still have to choke up on the clubs; longer than stated, but still a good buy. The bag is ok, not sturdy and hacks several pockets. Lighter weight
customer_reviews.author: JaneD

customer_reviews.title: it's a good set of clubs for the price point and casual ...
customer_reviews.text: As several reviews said, it's a good set of clubs for the price point and casual golfers, but the bag is average at best. The bag is thin with very few pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for any beginner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my girlfriend as it was her first time playing. Don't waste your money on a high end set for someone who may not play more than a few times a year. This is definitely worth it. There were enough clubs for her to get by on the very seldom times she gets out.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Middle School golf. She loved it! Great storage space and light enough to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: MenCatt

product_meta.title: Wilson Women's Complete Golf Set
feature_bullets: The super game improvement design focuses on generating more distance for beginner golfers
Designed for Women's swing speeds with low center of gravity for improved launch characteristics
Large sweet spot irons feature perimeter weighting for improved performance on off center hits
Lightweight Women's sized components and flexible shafts
Lightweight Women's' cart bag features two convenient lifting handles and numerous pockets

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
